title: Bug 48117two misspellings in the javadoc of class "org.apache.catalina.startup.ContextConfig"
description: Bug 48117two misspellings in the javadoc of class "org.apache.catalina.startup.ContextConfig" in protected synchronized void stop(): (Line: 1059)// Removing sercurity role'security' is misspelled to 'sercurity'in protected InputSource getWebXmlSource(String filename, String path): (Line: 1354)/ @param filenameName of the file (possibly with one or more leading pathsegemnts) to read @param pathLocation that filename is relative to @return/'segments' is misspelled to 'segemnts'.
